eutros.multiblocktweaker.crafttweaker.gtwrap.interfaces

Interface IBlockInfo


  • public interface IBlockInfo
    This is used to define what block should show in the JEI preview.

    It is used in MultiblockShapeInfoBuilder.where(String, IBlockInfo).

    See Also:
    MultiblockShapeInfoBuilder, IMultiblockShapeInfo
    ZenClass:
    mods.gregtech.multiblock.IBlockInfo

    • Field Summary

      static IBlockInfo EMPTY
      An IBlockInfo that displays nothing.

      • controller

        static IBlockInfo controller(java.lang.String id,
                             @Nullable
                             @Nullable crafttweaker.api.world.IFacing facing)
        Get an IBlockInfo from a controller's string ID.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the meta tile entity to display.
        facing - (Optional) The direction this should face. IFacing.west() by default.
        Returns:
        An IBlockInfo that represents the given block.
